code: import React from'react';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import'./style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SummaryCards=()=>{const transactions=useSelector(state=>state.transactions.transactions);const income=transactions.filter(t=>t.type==='income').reduce((sum,t)=>sum+t.amount,0);const expenses=transactions.filter(t=>t.type==='expense').reduce((sum,t)=>sum+t.amount,0);const balance=income-expenses;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"summary-cards",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card income",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Przychody"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[income.toFixed(2)," z\u0142"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card expense",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Wydatki"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[expenses.toFixed(2)," z\u0142"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card balance",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Saldo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[balance.toFixed(2)," z\u0142"]})]})]});};export default SummaryCards;
